component.text: Routing protocols create and maintain data structures
Routing protocols use routing algorithms to identify the best route(s)
I will use the EIGRP DUAL algorithm to identify what the best routes are and submit the best route(s) to the routing table.

  • Neighbor table
  • Topology table
